alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 18 at 9:31AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, including the following areas, Hartford CT, Tolland CT and Windham CT. Portions of Massachusetts, including the following areas, Eastern Hampden MA, Northern Worcester MA and Southern Worcester MA. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rain totals of 2-3 inches and a current 1 and 3 hourly flash flood guidance below that threshold, combined with very wet antecedent soil in the watch area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
